info.title: CogStack Model Serve APIs
info.summary: A model serving and governance system for CogStack NLP solutions

Bad credentials or the user is inactive.

get.description: Get information about the model being served

schema.description: The texts in the jsonlines format and each line contains {"text": "<TEXT>"[, "name": "<NAME>"]}

schema.description: List of concepts (Label IDs) that should not be removedd during the redaction process. List should be in the format ['label1','label2'...]
schema.title: Concepts To Keep

parameters.description: List of concepts (Label IDs) that should not be removedd during the redaction process. List should be in the format ['label1','label2'...]

schema.description: Return warning when no entities were detected for redaction to prevent potential info leaking
schema.title: Warn On No Redaction

schema.description: The custom symbols used for masking detected spans

post.description: Upload one or more trainer export files and trigger the supervised training

parameters.name: epochs

schema.description: The number of training epochs
schema.title: Epochs

parameters.description: The number of training epochs

parameters.name: lr_override

schema.description: The override of the initial learning rate
schema.title: Lr Override

parameters.description: The override of the initial learning rate

parameters.name: test_size

schema.description: The override of the test size in percentage. (For a 'huggingface-ner' model, a negative value can be used to apply the train-validation-test split if implicitly defined in trainer export: 'projects[0]' is used for training, 'projects[1]' for validation, and 'projects[2]' for testing)
schema.title: Test Size

parameters.description: The override of the test size in percentage. (For a 'huggingface-ner' model, a negative value can be used to apply the train-validation-test split if implicitly defined in trainer export: 'projects[0]' is used for training, 'projects[1]' for validation, and 'projects[2]' for testing)

parameters.name: early_stopping_patience

schema.description: The number of evaluations to wait for improvement before stopping the training. (Non-positive values disable early stopping)
schema.title: Early Stopping Patience

parameters.description: The number of evaluations to wait for improvement before stopping the training. (Non-positive values disable early stopping)

parameters.name: log_frequency

schema.description: The number of processed documents or epochs after which training metrics will be logged
